data.title: Venue
data.meta_description: Sands Expo and Convention Centre, Marina Bay Sands 10 Bayfront Avenue, Singapore 018956
data.text:
Food & Beverage

Cafeterias are available within the exhibition halls at Basement 2 & Level 1 from 10.00am to 6.00pm.

SweetSpot cafes are available at Level 1 and Level 3 of the Sands Expo and Convention Centre. Opening hours are from 7.00am to 7.00pm.

Wi-Fi

There is Wi-Fi provided for in the exhibition hall. For stronger connection, ITB Asia attendees may enjoy wireless surfing at our Wi-Fi hotspots within the Exhibition Hall.

Getting to the Venue

Taking Public Transport Marina Bay Sands is linked directly to Bayfront MRT station (CE1, Exit B, C, D, E) along the Circle Line Extension.

The following bus routes serve Marina Bay Sands Hotel and Marina Bay Sands MICE: 97/97E, 106, 133, 502/502A, 518/518A, NR1 (Available on Fridays, Saturdays and eve of public holidays), and NR6 (Available on Fridays, Saturdays and eve of public holidays).
